DOC.brief_summary: The American Diabetes Association ( ADA ) , among medical society , strongly recommend medical nutrition therapy ( MNT ) prevention management type 2 diabetes . However , ADA recognize `` one size fit '' diet thus recommend MNT conduct consultation register dietitian ( RD ) . Previous study show use diabetes-specific nutritional formula , integral part MNT , lower postprandial blood glucose level . Through experience Joslin 's Weight Achievement Intensive Treatment ( Why WAIT™ ) program , apply MNT within structure dietary intervention protocol best impact blood glucose value body weight . Meanwhile , frequent use health coach dietary intervention prove effective manage diabetes induce weight loss . However , study compare three intervention method randomize clinical study . The aim study evaluate effect different model conduct medical nutrition therapy glycemic control patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect 3 Different Models MNT DM Control Overweight Patients With T2DM
